column3: We've had no word from the guildmaster since he left for Kugane. I do hope he hasn't gotten lost...or worse.
I have everything under control here, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. It sounds like Martyn's the one who really needs your help right now.
I don't care how good this Gogo thinks he is, no paltry imitator stands a chance against you, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>!
Still no word from Martyn, but never fear─it shouldn't be long before he's found a prospective rival for you.
I can only imagine what Martyn is up to in Limsa, but you'll look after him, won't you?
The Arcanists' Guild? He wasn't offering more of his private lessons again, was he? Given the opportunity to flaunt his knowledge, the man simply can't help himself.
Martyn said he has a good feeling about Gridania. I certainly hope he's right.
I heard Martyn was actually after a bounty, is that right? Somehow I'm not surprised.
He wasn't ruffling any feathers at the stables, was he? Surely not...
To be honest, it's hard to picture Martyn as a villain, even if he's only acting.
By the sounds of it, Royse has afforded Martyn more than an unfair advantage, so don't worry about holding back.
You were absolutely brilliant, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>! I can scarcely remember the last time the Celestium was so lively.
